title: Girls With Guns
author: VD
content_html:
As usual, where others go left, SILENZIOSA goes… purple. The Princess of the Blood and her fellow students are learning how to shoot and the results are varied.

In other girls with guns news, Snakehand has concluded, so this week the daily serialization of THE SIDEWINDERS continues with La Gringa. Both are novels in a Western series written by The Legend Chuck Dixon, so you know it’s good.

DISCUSS ON SG
